data.title: Alchetron, The Free Social Encyclopedia
data.meta_description: Matthew's Days (Polish ywot Mateusza) is a 1968 Polish drama film directed by Witold Leszczyski. It was listed to compete at the 1968 Cannes Film Festival, but the festival was cancelled due to the events of May 1968 in France. The film was also selected as the Polish entry for the Best Foreign L
